<!-- Physics stuff -->

\let\@posendelta\posendelta
\newcommand{\posendelta}[2][-m^2]{\mathtip{\@posendelta[#1]{#2}}{\text{Positive energy delta function: }\@posendelta[#1]{#2}}=\deltafn{#2^2 #1}\thetafn{#2^0}}

\let\@normalized\normalized
\newcommand{\normalized}[2][]{\mathtip{\@normalized{#2}}{\text{Normalized } #1 =#2(2\pi)^{#1}}}

\let\@dn\dn
\newcommand{\dn}[2][]{\,\mathtip{\@dn[#1]{#2}}{\@normalized{\differential}^{#1}#2=\frac{\dd[#1]{#2}}{(2\pi)^{#1}}}\,}


\let\@nposendelta\nposendelta
\newcommand{\nposendelta}[2][-m^2]{\mathtip{\@nposendelta[#1]{#2}}{\text{Normalized positive energy delta function: }\@nposendelta[#1]{#2}=\@posendelta[#1]{#2} 2\pi= 2 \pi \deltafn{#2^2 #1}\thetafn{#2^0}}}
\let\@ndeltafn\ndeltafn
\newcommand{\ndeltafn}[2][]{\mathtip{\@ndeltafn[#1]{#2}}{\text 
{Normalized Dirac delta function: } \@ndeltafn[#1]{#2} = (2\pi)^{#1}\delta^{#1}\left(#2\right)}}

<!-- Fourrier transforms  -->

\let\@FT\FT
\newcommand{\FT}[3][]{\mathtip{\@FT[#1]{#2}{#3}}{\text{Fourier transform of $#2$ in variable $#1$: }{\@FT[#1]{#2}{#3} = \int \dd{#1} #2(#1) \exp{\im#3 \cdot #1}}}}

\let\@invFT\invFT

\newcommand{\invFT}[3][]{\mathtip{\@invFT[#1]{#2}{#3}}{\text{inverse Fourier transform of $#2$ in variable $#1$: }{\@invFT[#1]{#2}{#3} = \frac{1}{2\pi}\int  \dd{#1}\exp{-\im#3 \cdot #1} #2(#1)  }}}

\let\@ft\ft

\newcommand{\ft}[3][x]{\mathtip{\@ft[#1]{#2}{#3}}{\text{Fourier transform of $#2$ in variable $#1$: }{\@ft[#1]{#2}{#3}\left(#3\right)
 = \int \dd{#1} #2(#1) \exp{\im#3 \cdot #1}}}}
 
\let\@invft\invft

\newcommand{\invft}[3][x]{\mathtip{\@invft[#1]{#2}{#3}}{\text{inverse Fourier transform of $#2$ in variable $#1$: }{\@invft[#1]{#2}{#3}\left(#3\right) =\frac{1}{2\pi}\int  \dd{#1}\exp{-\im#3 \cdot #1} #2(#1)}}}

\newcommand{\SRDA}{\mathtip{\@SRDA}{\invmink \partialder_\mu\partialder_\nu}}

\let\@LC\LC
\newcommand{\LC}[3]{\mathtip{\@LC{#1}{#2}{#3}}{\text{Levi-Civita Connection: }\Gamma\ind{#1}{#2#3}=
\frac{1}{2} \invmet[#1 \rho]
\brk[\Big]{
    \ipdv{\met[\rho #1]}{#2}
    +\ipdv{\met[\rho #2]}{#1}
    -\ipdv{\met[#2 #1]}{\rho}}
    }}
